div.p: REST-HARROW or Cammock, the Ononis Λr-venfis. A decoction of this plant has been much re-commended to horſes labouring under a ſtoppage of urine. It is the peſt of ſome corn-fields ; but in its-younger ſtate, before the plant has acquired its thorns, it is a moſt acceptable food to ſhccp.
